trans-unit.source: Used to specify the type of event, and its arguments (if any) to be generated as part of the rendering of text to speech by a custom synthetic speech engine.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado para especificar o tipo de evento e os seus argumentos (caso existam) para ser gerado como parte da composição de reconhecimento de voz do texto para por um motor de reconhecimento de voz personalizadas sintético.

trans-unit.source: A custom speech synthesis engine requests the generation of events under the Speech Platform by providing an appropriate SpeechEventInfo instance to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> engine site object passed to implementations of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A geração de eventos sob a plataforma de voz os pedidos de um motor de synthesis de reconhecimento de voz personalizadas, fornecendo uma instância de SpeechEventInfo adequada para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>Membro o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>transmitido um objeto de site do motor para implementações de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constucts an appropriate <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Constucts apropriadas <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Permitted values used for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2` and their meaning is dictated by the type of event being requested, as specified by the member of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> used for `eventId`.
trans-unit.target: Permissão de valores utilizados para `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2` e os respetivos significado é ditado pelo tipo de evento que está a ser solicitado, conforme especificado pelo membro de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>utilizado para `eventId`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on appropriate values for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2`, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> The type of the events which can be handled by the Speech platform infrastructure can be obtained through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the synthesizer engine site implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.
trans-unit.target: Para informações detalhadas sobre os valores adequados para `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2`, consulte a documentação para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>o tipo de eventos que pode ser processado pela infraestrutura da plataforma de voz pode ser obtido através da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>propriedade a implementação de site do motor de sintetizador de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"></xref> indicating the sort of Speech platform event the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object is to handle.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"> </xref> que indica a ordenação de evento de plataforma de voz a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto está a processar.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"></xref> indicating how the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> reference of `param2` is to be interpreted, and, by implication, the use of `param1`.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"> </xref> que indica como o <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> referência de `param2` devem ser interpretadas e, por implicação, a utilização de `param1`.

trans-unit.source: An integer value to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro a ser transmitido para a plataforma de voz quando o evento pedido por instância de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> ser construído é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of this integer is implicitly determined by the value of `parameterType`.
trans-unit.target: O significado exato deste número inteiro é determinado implicitamente pelo valor `parameterType`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> instance referencing an object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> instância faz referência a um objeto.

trans-unit.source: to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: a ser transmitido para a plataforma de voz quando o evento pedido por instância de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> ser construído é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The type which must be referenced is explicitly defined by the value `parameterType`.
trans-unit.target: O tipo que têm de ser referenciado está explicitamente definido pelo valor `parameterType`.

trans-unit.source: The value <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr.Zero" name="System.IntPtr.Zero" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr.Zero" name="System.IntPtr.Zero" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is an instance of `SpeechEventInfo` and equal to the current instance of `SpeechEventInfo`.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto especificado é uma instância de `SpeechEventInfo` e igual para a instância atual do `SpeechEventInfo`.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a avaliar.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é igual a atual objeto; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified `SpeechEventInfo` object is equal to the current instance of `SpeechEventInfo`.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma determinada `SpeechEventInfo` objeto é igual à instância atual do `SpeechEventInfo`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> o objeto a avaliar.

trans-unit.source: if other is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se other é igual a atual objeto; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the Speech platform event which an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e defina o evento de plataforma de voz que uma instância de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> é utilizada a pedido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"></xref> as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""></xref>, indicating the event type the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object is to generate.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um membro de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"> </xref> como um <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""> </xref>, que indica o tipo de evento a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto está a gerar.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash code for a `SpeechEventInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um código hash para uma `SpeechEventInfo` objeto.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para uma <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of `SpeechEventInfo` are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de `SpeechEventInfo` são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event2`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto para comparar com `event2`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event1`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto para comparar com `event1`.

trans-unit.source: if event1 is the same as event2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if event1 is the same as event2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of `SpeechEventInfo` are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de `SpeechEventInfo` não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event2`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto para comparar com `event2`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event1`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto para comparar com `event1`.

trans-unit.source: if event1 is different from event2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if event1 is different from event2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the value (param1 in the constructor) to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e defina o valor ( param1 no construtor) a ser transmitido para a plataforma de voz para gerar um evento a instância atual do é utilizada a pedido.

trans-unit.source: The requirements and meaning of Param1 property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: Os requisitos e o significado da propriedade Param1 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>exclusivamente são determinados pelos valores de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>Propriedades a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use Param1, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como utilizar Param1, consulte a documentação para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> a ser transmitido para a plataforma de voz quando o evento especificado, a instância atual do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the instance (param2 in the constructor) referencing the object to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e defina o instância ( param2 no construtor) referencia o objeto a ser transmitido para a plataforma de voz para gerar um evento a instância atual do é utilizada a pedido.

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the Param2 property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: Os requisitos no `System.IntPtr` referência da propriedade Param2 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>exclusivamente são determinados pelos valores a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>Propriedades a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use Param2, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> referencing the object to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> referencia o objeto a ser transmitido para a plataforma de voz quando o evento especificado, a instância atual do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the object pointed to by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*> parameter on the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o tipo de dados do objeto indicado pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>parâmetro sobre os atuais <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and ParameterType properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: Os requisitos no `System.IntPtr` referência do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>exclusivamente são determinados pelos valores do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>ParameterType propriedades e o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, consulte a documentação para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""></xref> value corresponding to a member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"></xref> enumeration and indicating the data type of the object pointed to by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*> parameter and used as the second argument for the constructor of the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""> </xref> valor correspondente a um membro do <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"> </xref> enumeração e de que indica o tipo de dados do objeto indicada pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>parâmetro e utilizado como o segundo argumento para o construtor do atual <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>
